short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shared mute list for Twitter/X, target to mute farm bots in the replies of popular tweets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For several months now, Twitter/X has been experiencing an issue with bots farming views on popular tweets. These bots often post unrelated content, making it difficult to find comments related to the original tweet.

To address this, I began muting these accounts, which significantly improved my experience when reading comments. However, some farm accounts still slipped through. By using this extension to mute these accounts, you'll see far fewer farm bots, enhancing your experience and helping other users enjoy a cleaner comment section as well.

For more information, access the source code here: https://github.com/pedrolzoliveira/mute-bot-twitter-x

If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, feel free to message me on Twitter/X: https://x.com/PedrolzOliveira
